title: The King Awakes
description: Outcast from the City with his mother and baby sister, young Red finds a Britain devastated by a nuclear holocaust and inhabited by savage tribes: outmen, cannibals, Magickers and War Lords. Pursued by the evil Guardians, Red's one hope of survival lies with a mysterious stranger- a soldier woken from the distant past to fulfill a famous legend.First book in The Sword and the Dream trilogy.
author: Janice Elliott
